title: Didn't recieve 7/1 mystery champ.
body: I had linked my facebook account when the forum post said connect between 6/29/2015 11:59PM PDT and 6/30/2015 11:59PM PDT and apparently it changed for BST so I set it at the wrong time. Now I don't have my champ. I set it when it said PDT though so I do believe I should receive my champ. I don't know if this was a bug or if the forum post was edited but this is unfair{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Hey! 

We're still in the process of handing out champions/skin rewards for Team Up Week. You can keep track of updates [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3VhOeAbf-pool-party-rewards-distribution-on-going)! 

If you're worried you didn't connect in time, you can always [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
